name: zickzack scarf
notes:
*an impressive yet easy to knit scarf in the style of a great italian designer. 
the chevrons are worked with single increases and decreases – no knots in your fingers trying to knit complicated double decreases and no double increases where the stitches get tight and hard to work with...*

**material:**	
c1 - lang yarns mille colori baby, colour 51 (2 balls)
c2 - lang yarns mille colori baby, colour 52 (2 balls)
(or any self striping fingering weight / sock yarn where the colour changes are not too fast or slow.) 
knitting needle us 2½ - 3.0 mm

**size of finished scarf**: ca. 0.23 x 1.60 m (9 x 63 inches)
